import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import GlobalStyle from '../../src/Utils/GlobalStyle.js'

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<GlobalStyle />
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"accessibility"}}>{`Accessibility`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Web and software experiences should be accessible for everyone, regardless of abilities or impairments. Accessible design not only helps users with disabilities; it provides better user experiences for everyone.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"categories"}}>{`Categories`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Disabilities can be thought of as a mismatch between one’s ability and one’s environment, and can be broken into three main types:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Situational`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`A person with typical vision might struggle to view their screen in a bright environment. Or, a person sitting in a library may be unable to watch a video with the audio turned on.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Temporary`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`A person with a broken wrist may not be able to type but will regain the ability when healed.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Long-lasting`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`This is what people typically think of when they hear “disability.”`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"how-they-experience-an-interface"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h3">{`How they experience an interface`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May use a screen reader to experience interfaces.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May rely on Braille output.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Cannot be expected to use a pointer or mouse for input.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May use screen readers, screen magnifiers, high-contrast modes, and/or monochrome displays.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May have their browser font size adjusted to a larger setting.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Will not be able to differentiate between some colors on an interface. That's why some app like Spotify put a dot near their action icons.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Rely on non-color information to use an interface.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May rely on captioning and other alternative representations of audio.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May rely on keyboards, track balls, voice recognition, and other assistive technologies to interact with an interface.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May not be able to use a keyboard, mouse, or other pointer.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May have limited working memory and need information to remain visible throughout the completion of a task.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`May experience seizures when exposed to flashing content/rapid animation (epilepsy).`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"what-designers-should-think-about"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h3">{`What designers should think about`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Maximize the readability and visual clarity of content.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Consider how relative proximity of information changes when a page is magnified.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Follow `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://www.nngroup.com/articles/keyboard-accessibility/"}}>{`keyboard guidelines`}</MDXTag>{` and test with a screen reader to ensure the page is read to the user in a logical order.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Run your design through a color-blind simulator. If the design doesn’t work, try another approach. If you’re working in Sketch/XD, we recommend the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://www.getstark.co/"}}>{`Stark`}</MDXTag>{` plugin.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`To get a better understanding of the various low-vision disabilities, we recommend using the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/nocoffee/jjeeggmbnhckmgdhmgdckeigabjfbddl"}}>{`NoCoffee`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/spectrum/ofclemegkcmilinpcimpjkfhjfgmhieb/related"}}>{`Spectrum`}</MDXTag>{` Chrome plugin to preview websites.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Design for good keyboard interaction, making sure all actions are keyboard accessible and efficient.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Learn how to navigate using a keyboard and spend some time navigating the web, email, and digital products using only the keyboard.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Designers should understand the danger of complex language, non-stopping or flashing animations and fundamental cognitive usability heuristics.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"global-standards"}}>{`Global standards`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://a11yproject.com/"}}>{`The A11Y Project`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://www.w3.org/WAI/"}}>{`World Wide Web Consortium`}</MDXTag>{` (W3C)‘s Web Accessibility Initiative (WAI) is an effort to improve the accessibility of the World Wide Web for people of all abilities.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Web Accessibility Initiative (WAI) contributors create and maintain `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG21/"}}>{`Web Content Accessibility Guidelines`}</MDXTag>{` (WCAG), which is the global accessibility standard.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
